actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Research and Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Research, Development, Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to prohibit reactivation of the High Flux Beam Reactor at Brookhaven National Laboratory.
short_title: Long Island Drinking Water Protection Act

summary.text: Long Island Drinking Water Protection Act - Directs the Secretary of Energy to ensure that the High Flux Beam Reactor at Brookhaven National Laboratory is not reactivated.

titles.title: Long Island Drinking Water Protection Act
A bill to prohibit reactivation of the High Flux Beam Reactor at Brookhaven National Laboratory.
